New Records: Jackson Jobe recorded his first MLB strikeout
Key Match Events: Jackson Jobe pitched three hitless innings
Sean Guenther had a nine-pitch inning
Game was affected by a 2-hour, 20-minute rain delay
Post-Match Reflections: Manager A.J. Hinch highlighted Jackson Jobe's performance
Team reflected on the challenge of bouncing back after clinching the playoff spot
Miscellaneous Highlights: Game was the Tigers' six-game winning streak being snapped
Emotional context of the Tigers clinching their first postseason berth in 10 years
